## Gradient2D.at() method

Sample the gradient at specific coordinates.

**Signature:**

```typescript
at(x: number, y: number): Color;
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

</td><td>

number


</td><td>

</td></tr>

**Returns:**

[Color](./chromaterm.color.md)
